name: Sneaky Snacks
description:
WebGL and audio doesn't always play nice, so try out the desktop build to hear better audio!

Reclaim the Meatus.

Sneaky Snacks is a game where you play as a granny's mischievous little dog, where your objective is to retrieve the meat back to your dog bed. Avoid lowering Granny's affection level by not getting caught and by peeing outside instead. If Granny's affection runs out, the game resets! 

(Submission for Major Jam #2: Love. Limitation: All textures must fit within one 128x128 image.)

Controls :

  • WASD to move. 
  • Hold Space to drag the snacks. 
  • Press F to interact with the duck toy.
  • To go Outside, try running to the left side of the room!

All sprites fit on this sheet:

Team Members: 

Programming: Harrison Cote 

Programming/Music: Zach Berglund

Art: Tina Lu

Sound Design: Alex Larumbe

  Based on our artist's dog, Poca!
